thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Invibes Advertising Completes EUR 2 Mln Private Placement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Invibes Advertising Completes EUR 2 Mln Private Placement
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - INVIBES ADVERTISING NV:
* €2 MILLION PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO DRIVE INVESTMENTS * ISSUANCE AND ADMISSION TO EURONEXT ACCESS OF 380,952 NEW SHARES AT PRICE OF EUR 5.25 PER SHARE
* ALSO PLANS TO TRANSFER SHARE TO EURONEXT GROWTH MARKET IN NEAR FUTURE
* FOLLOWING TRANSACTION, CO’S SHARE CAPITAL WILL AMOUNT TO €4.2 MILLION, DIVIDED INTO 2.6 MILLION SHARES
* ADMISSION OF NEW SHARES ISSUED VIA PRIVATE PLACEMENT ON EURONEXT ACCESS IS SCHEDULED TO TAKE PLACE BEFORE 30 APRIL 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
